title: Orcs Must Die! 3
description: Orcs Must Die! 3 is a 2020 action-tower defense video game developed and published by Robot Entertainment. It is the fourth installment in the Orcs Must Die! series, and the direct sequel to Orcs Must Die! 2. It was released as a timed exclusive on Stadia on July 14, 2020, and is scheduled to be released for Windows, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S on July 23, 2021.
